Quest_Name: Death Happens as You Make Other Plans
General_Description: '''Death Happens as You Make Other Plans''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Sparta]]n wrote a letter to a friend, making plans to collect stolen loot. Yet no such collection would be made, as the Spartan soon met his end.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
